live_updates: Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution. Thank you for your patience.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
27997.summary: Some customers in the Whitehorn area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
27997.title: Oct 26 – Calgary (Whitehorn) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
